name: Distant Transmission (itch)
description:
Crash landing in an unknown area, two women find themselves stranded and must make their way to their ship’s distress beacon to go home. Distant Transmission is a short local co-op puzzle platformer that relies on working together with a friend to overcome challenges and make it home.

Explore the new area as you two make your way towards the distress beacon.

Features

  • Short Campaign – Play alongside your friend or alone as you make your way to the beacon
  • Charming Visuals – Immerse yourself in the minimalist art style that breathes life into the characters and the world
  • Calming Soundtrack – Experience the relaxing piano that helps sets the tone of the game
  • Numerous Bonuses – Continue the game after your first playthrough with various additional content to unlock
  • Accessible Controls – Rebind your controls to better suit your needs as well as support multiple controllers ranging from keyboard to Nintendo Switch JoyCons
